‚ú® Polished User Experience

  • Safe Actions: Implemented a global "Safe Execution" wrapper. Delete and Save operations now handle errors gracefully with consistent user feedback.
  • Responsive Forms: All management editors (Teachers, Subjects, Standards, Structure) now use a unified FormSheet component with automatic loading states and validation.
  • Visual Consistency: Standardized "Safe Delete" logic across Drafts, History, and Management screens.

üè´ Campus Management

  • Capacity Planning: School Structure sections now display the Total Student Strength (sum of all classes) in the header.
  • Unified Editors: Refactored Teacher, Subject, and Academic Year editors for a smoother, crash-free experience.

‚öôÔ∏è Under the Hood

  • Hooks Migration: Massive reduction in boilerplate code (approx. 40% less in forms) by migrating stateful widgets to flutter_hooks.
  • Database Integrity: Complete refactor of data relationships to use native IsarLinks, ensuring better referential integrity between Teachers, Classes, and Subjects.
  • Performance: Optimized form controllers and eliminated manual lifecycle management for text inputs and timers.
